entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Store Assistant
entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Store Assistant position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Job Qualifications:
  • Proven retail sales experience.
  • The ability to stand for extended periods
  • Strong organizational skills.
  • Effective communication skills.
  • Experience: Retail: 1 year (Preferred)
Job Description:
  • Receiving, processing, and organizing shipments and deliveries accordingly.
  • Restocking depleted or low shop items and ensuring that the sales floor is organized according to established guidelines.
  • Assisting customers in locating desired shop items.
  • Informing customers of shop promotions to encourage purchases.
  • Performing regular price audits to identify and correct price discrepancies.

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Jora Jobs is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Store Assistant which positioned at Johor

entry.title: Sunaero Asia Sdn Bhd Vacancies ADMIN ASSISTANT

link.title: Sunaero Asia Sdn Bhd Vacancies ADMIN ASSISTANT

entry.content:
Sunaero Asia Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for ADMIN ASSISTANT position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

  • Handle a variety of administrative support tasks, including answering phones, receiving visitors, preparing meeting and training rooms, sorting and distributing mail;
  • Maintain inventory of office supplies and assist ordering process after approval;
  • Ensure a clean and tidy office environment (overseeing the cleaners);
  • To key-in relevant data that required by Statistics Department of Malaysia;
  • Provide ad-hoc administrative support as needed to staffs;
  • Manage all incoming and outgoing correspondences including filing system for Management Office.
  • Managing relationships with external IT vendor who provide IT support;
  • Ensure the maintenance of facility is appropriately maintained.
  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in Business Studies/Administration/Management, Human Resource Management or equivalent.
  • At least 3 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s): PAYROLL, STATUTORY PAYMENT, ADMINISTRATIVE, PURCHASING
  • Preferably Junior Executive specialized in Human Resources or equivalent.

Company Overview

Sunaero is looking to recruit an experienced and passionate sales executive to join our expanding Business Aviation MRO client based in the Southern Region of Peninsular Malaysia, Iskandar Puteri, Johor.
Our unique brands in markets around the world open up countless opportunities to follow your convictions and explore new paths.
We serve the military, commercial, bizjet markets by selling and providing services, equipment and composites repair to aircraft and helicopters manufacturers, operators and MRO.
Our patented and approved solutions offer significant time savings and reduce drastically aircraft downtime.
Our base of satisfied and returning customer proves the efficiency of our service. If you have an entrepreneurial mindset that allows you to always think out of the box - take the chance and shape the future together with us.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor - Others.
Apply Online

entry.title: MINDe Group - Recruitment Firm Vacancies CALL SERVICE CENTRE MANAGER (Based KL l up to RM9K)

link.title: MINDe Group - Recruitment Firm Vacancies CALL SERVICE CENTRE MANAGER (Based KL l up to RM9K)

entry.content:
MINDe Group - Recruitment Firm is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for CALL SERVICE CENTRE MANAGER (Based KL l up to RM9K) position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Available Job Opportunity(s):
  • Position: Call Service Center Manager
  • Industry: Call Center / Electronic Repair House
  • Location: Petaling Jaya / KLCC
  • Salary Range: RM7,000 to RM9,000
  • Working Hours: 5 Working Days (8AM to 5.30PM)
The Selling Point of your New Employer:
  • A Covid-19 Proof Safe Company
  • Still hiring at this crisis
  • Still receiving 2021 forecast order
  • Still on growth stage
  • Strong Financial status (Strong Cash flow)
The Benefits and Compensation Plan you'll entitle:
  • Bonus Scheme (Performance Bonus)
  • Personal Medical & Insurance Scheme
  • Annual Leave
  • Public Holidays
  • Internal & External Training provided
What you Need to Succeed?
  • At least (10) years relevant working experience in Call Service Center / Electronic Repair House working environment
  • Good in People Management Skill
  • Prefer Mandarin speaker (able to speak & write in Mandarin) to work closely with China counterpart
You'll be Responsible for:
Job Summary: -
  • Required to in charge 3 Centers
  • Overall managing 60± headcounts
Job Responsibilities: -
  • Lead the team towards the overall management and strategic direction of after-sales service business and observe all statutory and internal control requirements and compliances.
  • Provide operational leadership and direction to formulate and implement business strategy to achieve growth, financial and other key metrics and targets.
  • Develop and execute strategic plans for the efficient and effective use of resources.
  • Oversee all aspect of supply chain, workshop, IT, customer service and program functions.
  • Prepare and implement annual budget and capital expenditure for the business group operation.
  • Identify, develop and implement long and short term strategic plans in support of Company’s corporate vision.
  • Initiate and implement an innovative environment and high performance culture to provide a competitive edge for the after-sales service business.
  • Assess business case analysis for viability of projects and identify new opportunity for growth.
To grab this opportunity, you Have To:
  • Possess Diploma/ Bachelor Degree in Business Administration or equivalent
  • Minimum (10) years' relevant experience in Call Service Center / Electronic Repair House working environment
  • Prefer Manadrin speaker (able to speak & write in Mandarin) to work closely with China counterpart
  • Applicable to Malaysian only
What you need To Do Now?
  • If you're interested with this opportunity, please click 'APPLY NOW' attached with the latest CV in details
  • If this opportunity not an ideal role for you, please click 'APPLY NOW' to deposit your latest CV and we shall contact with you if have another opportunities suit your profile.

Company Overview

Founded since 2007
Officially registered since 2009
Who are we?
We are the mindful matchmakers. We match teams of professionals to help companies grow, while creating opportunities for candidates to find the right vocation. We build lasting robust relationships. In a world of constant change, we strive to seek the best candidate that fills not only a vacancy, but truly integrates with a team to bring it to greater heights. We are professional negotiators. We are the connectors. The negotiators who bring both company and candidate to an equal ground. We are talent builders for our clients, and career advisers for the candidates. We are people experts. We know the people we work with, and the industries we represent. We close positions for our clients by understanding the people they need. We build teams with insightful recruitment. To build a team, we delve into what makes the industry work, gathering in-depth insights to fill vacancies with the right talent. Our evangelists are team builders. As the chief, the alpha of the team, they have to make sure their group stays cohesive. They appreciate having the right people on board, as they know how important good personalities and excellent skills are to their team. Our purpose is to exist as an opportunity creator. We understand that not everyone has a dream job. Not everyone is suited to what they do. We identify talent. We bring them to the companies who need them. We enhance lives and create opportunities.
We help companies & teams Grow Through Connections.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor, Kedah, Kuala Lumpur, Kelantan, Melaka, Negeri Sembilan, Penang, Pahang, Perak, Perlis, Sabah, Selangor, Sarawak, Terengganu, Labuan, Putrajaya.
Apply Online

entry.title: Perodua Sales Sdn Bhd Vacancies Customer Care Executive - Service Centre, Central & Southern Region

link.title: Perodua Sales Sdn Bhd Vacancies Customer Care Executive - Service Centre, Central & Southern Region

entry.content:
Perodua Sales Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Customer Care Executive - Service Centre, Central & Southern Region position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Requirement:
  • Bachelor Degree in related field.
  • A minimum of 1 year working experience (fresh graduate are encouraged to apply)
  • Experienced in customer service is an added advantage
  • Pleasant personality, tactful, organized and able to multitask
  • Excellent interpersonal skills with ability to communicate effectively in English and Bahasa Melayu (oral and written)
  • Self motivated with strong sense of responsibility and confidentiality
  • Able to work overtime or during weekend (if required)
Responsibilities:
  • To act as a middle person between the company and customers in resolving customer complaints effectively and professionally
  • To motivate outlet staff in providing excellent customer service
  • To provide feedback and monitor the progress/status of customer complaints cases
  • To prepare weekly and monthly report on customer care related projects and issues
  • To ensure customer lounge is always clean, neat and tidy
  • To be responsible in arranging refreshments for customers
  • To be responsible in decorating the outlets on any festive/promotion events

Company Overview

Perusahaan Otomobil Kedua Sdn Bhd, PERODUA (054795V) has been Malaysia’s top-selling carmaker since 2006, shifting over 3.2 million vehicles since its inception in 1993.
A joint-venture between Malaysian and Japanese companies, Perodua quickly became renowned for making high-quality, fuel-efficient, practical, reliable and affordable cars.
Many models have been Malaysian favourites. These include the Kancil, Kelisa, Viva, Axia, Bezza, Alza and of course the Myvi, which has been the nation’s best-selling car for nearly a decade with over a million produced.
Based in Sungai Choh, Rawang, Perodua’s 520-acre HQ comprises a corporate building, two vehicle manufacturing plants, R&D facilities, a test track, a parts warehouse, training facilities, a mosque and a child care centre. Additionally, the company has engine and transmission manufacturing facilities in Sendayan, Negeri Sembilan.
Currently, Perodua has been stepping up its indigenous design, innovation and localisation efforts. Besides having 90% of its parts locally sourced, the new Myvi has an upper body that is completely the work of local talent, as well as locally-developed features to better suit the Malaysian market.
Perodua benefits from adopting many Japanese work ethics and practices including Training Dojos, Kaizen, Gemba and “Just-in-Time”, towards a more efficient and disciplined work environment. At the same time, Perodua is first and foremost proudly Malaysian in identity, incorporating values such as humility, harmony and cultural tolerance in its workplace.
Perodua is a company that always puts people first, whether it be our customers or employees. We believe in constantly motivating and developing our workforce through various training programmes and courses. Staff performance is rewarded via constant reviewing and upgrading of benefits, and staff who have displayed potential will be open to many opportunities for career advancement.
Perodua is in the midst of a transformation roadmap that is seeing the modernisation of its plant and a renewed emphasis on customer satisfaction, towards its goal of becoming a world-class automotive company.
Perodua Sales Sdn Bhd, PSSB (066332U) is responsible for the sales, marketing and distribution of all Perodua vehicles as well as after sales and spare parts operations.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor, Selangor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Perodua Sales Sdn Bhd is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Customer Care Executive - Service Centre, Central & Southern Region which positioned at Johor, Selangor

entry.title: Company Confidential Vacancies FINANCE EXECUTIVE
entry.content:
Company Confidential is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for FINANCE EXECUTIVE position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

  • ​To assist in daily acounting function such as AP, AR, Cash Flow and other related accounting tasks as assigned;
  • Manage cash flow and monitoring the financial transactions;
  • Responsible for accurate and timely closing of payment;
  • Prepare payment vouchers, issue cheques and assist in general accounting related function and duties;
  • Ensure proper filling of all documents related to Finance Department
  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in Finance/Accountancy/Banking or equivalent.
  • Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia, English
  • At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s): ACCOUNTING SYSTEM, COMPUTER LITERATE
  • Preferably Junior Executive specialized in Finance - General/Cost Accounting or equivalent.

Company Overview

Since 1993, Sunaero has been developing a complete range of innovative solutions for the operational maintenance of tanks. Thanks to these solutions validated by aircraft manufacturers (OAM), we work for civil operators as well as air forces and maintenance centers (MRO).
With our three locations in Europe-Middle East-Africa, Americas and Asia, we have set ourselves the challenge of creating a high-quality service offering combining our patented technology and our unique know-how.
Always reduce downtime for planes and helicopters for maximum added value for our customers.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
